messages.message: Since Regex is basically hieroglyphics to some of us have we looked into something like: https://github.com/MaLeLabTs/RegexGenerator
Regex generation is a really hard problem and so these things usually tend to be really slow or really inaccurate, but may be worth taking a look
And by hard I mean computationally - even just trying their provided example, it estimates 5-10 minutes to generate the regex
I rather have something slow, then nothing at all. We can’t keep selling a product where almost every extraction requires you to learn regex
This is where I put the obligatory JWZ quote: “Some people, when confronted with a problem, think “I know, I’ll use regular expressions.” Now they have two problems.”
